title: Is therea place in Wilmington that holds open audtions for plays?
text:
Here's a link to information about auditions at Wilmington Tickets:
http://www.wilmingtontickets.com/search?swhat=auditions&x=0&y=0



And here's a previous post at MyReporter.com that should provide
more information about local venues: http://www.myreporter.com/?p=126
